parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary stao stah'-o; to stand, used in various applications.
Neuter diminutive of pais; a childling, i.e., an infant, or a half-grown boy or girl; figuratively, an immature Christian.
Middle, in the middle, between, in the midst of. From meta; middle (neuter) noun).

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Middle - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To take (fold) in my arms. From en and a derivative of agkale; to take in one's arms, i.e. Embrace.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
